messages.content: Hello! How can I help you today?
Can you tell me the best way to make a lasagna?

Sure! Lasagna is a classic Italian dish that can be made in a variety of ways, but here is a basic recipe that you can use as a starting point:
Ingredients:
* 1 large lasagna dish
* 1 can of tomato sauce
* 1 cup of dried mushrooms
* 1/4 cup of chopped green onions
* 1/4 cup of dried basil
* 2 cups of shredded mozzarella cheese
* 1/4 cup of shredded chicken breasts
* 1/4 cup of diced tomatoes
* Salt and pepper to taste
* 1 pound of ground beef
* 1 can of diced tomatoes with the juice squeezed out
* 1 cup of shredded mozzarella cheese
* 1 cup of ricotta cheese
* 1/4 cup of crushed garlic
* 1/4 cup of crushed tomatoes with the juice squeezed out
* 1 cup of grated Parmesan cheese
* 1/4 cup of diced green onions
* 2 cloves of garlic minced
* 1 teaspoon of dried basil
* Salt and pepper to taste
* 1 cup of grated mozzarella cheese
* 1 cup of chopped green tomatoes
* 1/4 cup of shredded chicken breasts
* 1/4 cup of diced tomatoes with the juice squeezed out
* 1 cup of grated Parmesan cheese
* 1/4 cup of chopped parsley
* 1/4 teaspoon of dried basil
* 1 cup of grated mozzarella cheese
* 1/4 cup of grated Parmesan cheese
* 1/2 cup
